item.description:
In follow up to Jennifer's thoughts, this is to regroup and to discuss as small business owners the areas we want to discuss, share, and learn about.  I'm suggesting we meet at Bertucci’s in Newton after work and have a list of areas we can cover – including HR, finance, marketing, motivation, franchising, government resources, funding (and the option for people to suggest other areas) and then after the Meetup we can review the focus areas and set a schedule.  After all, owning a business is challenging - we should be able to help and support each other! 

I’ll also send out a survey link to the group so anyone who can’t attend can also share their thoughts.

Looking forward to hearing all your thoughts!
item.name: Regroup and share ideas: A meetup about the Meetup
